feature_model.name: LinuxKernel_mm
feature_model.feature_tree: :r LinuxKernel_mm(LinuxKernel_mm) :o SELECT_MEMORY_MODEL(SELECT_MEMORY_MODEL) :g (g0) [1,1] : FLATMEM_MANUAL(FLATMEM_MANUAL) : DISCONTIGMEM_MANUAL(DISCONTIGMEM_MANUAL) : SPARSEMEM_MANUAL(SPARSEMEM_MANUAL) :o DISCONTIGMEM(DISCONTIGMEM) :o SPARSEMEM(SPARSEMEM) :o FLATMEM(FLATMEM) :o FLAT_NODE_MEM_MAP(FLAT_NODE_MEM_MAP) :o NEED_MULTIPLE_NODES(NEED_MULTIPLE_NODES) :o HAVE_MEMORY_PRESENT(HAVE_MEMORY_PRESENT) :o SPARSEMEM_STATIC(SPARSEMEM_STATIC) :o SPARSEMEM_EXTREME(SPARSEMEM_EXTREME) :o SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP_ENABLE(SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP_ENABLE) :o SPARSEMEM_ALLOC_MEM_MAP_TOGETHER(SPARSEMEM_ALLOC_MEM_MAP_TOGETHER) :o SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP(SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP) :o HAVE_MEMBLOCK(HAVE_MEMBLOCK) :o HAVE_MEMBLOCK_NODE_MAP(HAVE_MEMBLOCK_NODE_MAP) :o HAVE_MEMBLOCK_PHYS_MAP(HAVE_MEMBLOCK_PHYS_MAP) :o HAVE_GENERIC_RCU_GUP(HAVE_GENERIC_RCU_GUP) :o ARCH_DISCARD_MEMBLOCK(ARCH_DISCARD_MEMBLOCK) :o NO_BOOTMEM(NO_BOOTMEM) :o MEMORY_ISOLATION(MEMORY_ISOLATION) :o MOVABLE_NODE(MOVABLE_NODE) :o HAVE_BOOTMEM_INFO_NODE(HAVE_BOOTMEM_INFO_NODE) :o MEMORY_HOTPLUG(MEMORY_HOTPLUG) :o MEMORY_HOTPLUG_SPARSE(MEMORY_HOTPLUG_SPARSE) :o MEMORY_HOTPLUG_DEFAULT_ONLINE(MEMORY_HOTPLUG_DEFAULT_ONLINE) :o MEMORY_HOTREMOVE(MEMORY_HOTREMOVE) :o ARCH_ENABLE_SPLIT_PMD_PTLOCK(ARCH_ENABLE_SPLIT_PMD_PTLOCK) :o MEMORY_BALLOON(MEMORY_BALLOON) :o BALLOON_COMPACTION(BALLOON_COMPACTION) :o COMPACTION(COMPACTION) :o MIGRATION(MIGRATION) :o ARCH_ENABLE_HUGEPAGE_MIGRATION(ARCH_ENABLE_HUGEPAGE_MIGRATION) :o PHYS_ADDR_T_64BIT(PHYS_ADDR_T_64BIT) :o BOUNCE(BOUNCE) :o NEED_BOUNCE_POOL(NEED_BOUNCE_POOL) :o VIRT_TO_BUS(VIRT_TO_BUS) :o MMU_NOTIFIER(MMU_NOTIFIER) :o KSM(KSM) :o ARCH_SUPPORTS_MEMORY_FAILURE(ARCH_SUPPORTS_MEMORY_FAILURE) :o MEMORY_FAILURE(MEMORY_FAILURE) :o HWPOISON_INJECT(HWPOISON_INJECT) :o TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE(TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE) :g (g1) [1,1] : TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE_ALWAYS(TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE_ALWAYS) : TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE_MADVISE(TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE_MADVISE) :o TRANSPARENT_HUGE_PAGECACHE(TRANSPARENT_HUGE_PAGECACHE) :o NEED_PER_CPU_KM(NEED_PER_CPU_KM) :o CLEANCACHE(CLEANCACHE) :o FRONTSWAP(FRONTSWAP) :o CMA(CMA) :o CMA_DEBUG(CMA_DEBUG) :o CMA_DEBUGFS(CMA_DEBUGFS) :o MEM_SOFT_DIRTY(MEM_SOFT_DIRTY) :o ZSWAP(ZSWAP) :o ZPOOL(ZPOOL) :o ZBUD(ZBUD) :o Z3FOLD(Z3FOLD) :o ZSMALLOC(ZSMALLOC) :o PGTABLE_MAPPING(PGTABLE_MAPPING) :o ZSMALLOC_STAT(ZSMALLOC_STAT) :o GENERIC_EARLY_IOREMAP(GENERIC_EARLY_IOREMAP) :o ARCH_SUPPORTS_DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT(ARCH_SUPPORTS_DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT) :o DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT(DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT) :o IDLE_PAGE_TRACKING(IDLE_PAGE_TRACKING) :o ZONE_DEVICE(ZONE_DEVICE) :o FRAME_VECTOR(FRAME_VECTOR) :o ARCH_USES_HIGH_VMA_FLAGS(ARCH_USES_HIGH_VMA_FLAGS) :o ARCH_HAS_PKEYS(ARCH_HAS_PKEYS)
feature_model.constraints: FLATNODEMEMMAPSPARSEMEM: ~FLAT_NODE_MEM_MAP or SPARSEMEM SPARSEMEMEXTREMESPARSEMEM: ~SPARSEMEM_EXTREME or SPARSEMEM SPARSEMEMVMEMMAPSPARSEMEMSPARSEMEMVMEMMAPENABLE: ~SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP or SPARSEMEM SPARSEMEMVMEMMAPENABLESPARSEMEMVMEMMAPSPARSEMEMSPARSEMEMVMEMMAPENABLE: ~SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP or SPARSEMEM_VMEMMAP_ENABLE MEMORYHOTPLUGSPARSESPARSEMEMMEMORYHOTPLUG: ~MEMORY_HOTPLUG_SPARSE or SPARSEMEM MEMORYHOTPLUGMEMORYHOTPLUGSPARSESPARSEMEMMEMORYHOTPLUG: ~MEMORY_HOTPLUG_SPARSE or MEMORY_HOTPLUG MEMORYHOTPLUGDEFAULTONLINEMEMORYHOTPLUG: ~MEMORY_HOTPLUG_DEFAULT_ONLINE or MEMORY_HOTPLUG MEMORYHOTREMOVEHAVEBOOTMEMINFONODE: ~MEMORY_HOTREMOVE or HAVE_BOOTMEM_INFO_NODE BALLOONCOMPACTIONCOMPACTIONMEMORYBALLOON: ~BALLOON_COMPACTION or COMPACTION MEMORYBALLOONBALLOONCOMPACTIONCOMPACTIONMEMORYBALLOON: ~BALLOON_COMPACTION or MEMORY_BALLOON COMPACTIONMIGRATION: ~COMPACTION or MIGRATION TRANSPARENTHUGEPAGECACHETRANSPARENTHUGEPAGE: ~TRANSPARENT_HUGE_PAGECACHE or TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE CMAMEMORYISOLATION: ~CMA or MEMORY_ISOLATION ZSWAPFRONTSWAP: ~ZSWAP or FRONTSWAP Z3FOLDZPOOL: ~Z3FOLD or ZPOOL PGTABLEMAPPINGZSMALLOC: ~PGTABLE_MAPPING or ZSMALLOC ZSMALLOCSTATZSMALLOC: ~ZSMALLOC_STAT or ZSMALLOC DEFERREDSTRUCTPAGEINITNOBOOTMEMMEMORYHOTPLUGARCHSUPPORTSDEFERREDSTRUCTPAGEINIT: ~DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT or NO_BOOTMEM MEMORYHOTPLUG DEFERREDSTRUCTPAGEINITNOBOOTMEMMEMORYHOTPLUGARCHSUPPORTSDEFERREDSTRUCTPAGEINIT: ~DEFERRED_STRUCT_PAGE_INIT or MEMORY_HOTPLUG
